name: Harvard Graphics Presentation
summary: Learn about .PRS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The PRS file extension was used by Harvard Graphics for Windows versions 1-3. Current Harvard Graphics programs include "Pro Presentations," "Advanced Presentations," "Easy Presentations," and "Harvard Graphics 98."

description: Presentation or slide show created with Harvard Graphics presentation software; may include text, images, charts, graphs, and other media; typically created from a pre-built template.
